column4: crawler :VLC did play well but I would like to fix the error on smplayer , as i know smplayer runs the code according to mplayer so it means mplayer having the same problem too ?

you can change the mediaplayer in firefox that is responsibe to play back media files. the standard one is gplayer or so. with mplugin you can change that. use my words and do a bit google. there are a lot of manuals out there.
: the most weird thing is , every mp4 on youtube not working , but other encoded mp4 works well. This is really a weird case
: I am using firefox now , anything related with firefox browser ?
i think you should change the multimedia plugin for firefox.
: i mean downloaded mp4 from youtube.
hm, maybe it doesn't get converted properly
: at the first view , it play out the video picture but when clicking the same file for the second view , it only got sound with no video
hm, what player do you use?
: vlc and mplayer .With mplayer downloaded code , and VLC it works
: vlc works , but not smplayer, I wanted smplayer to work too since it's more easy for newbie like us
it think it would be ebst if you go to smplayer irc-channel or find help that is more smplayer specific. this is no ubuntu thing anymore.
:crawler : using mediainfo for code output http://pastebin.com/kZW1T0iz
